name: Glitch Robe aka G4mE bReÄK3r
author: Mero
info:
"Long ago a powerful artifact crossed the alternate timelines and fell into the hands of a wizzrobe changing it into a robot and giving it immense power."
Happy April Fools Day, Yes I know it's late Moosh excuse my tardiness just this once.
description: Creates wormholes.Kills Link Good.kills Ganon too.
setup: Set your Interplanar Constantsconst int WPS_NULLBLADE = 88;const int SFX_NULLSBLADE = 2; //Sword Beamconst int SFX_GAMEBREAKER_OPEN = 52; //Rocket upconst int SFX_GAMEBREAKER_CLOSE = 53; //Rocket Downconst int GAMEBREAKER_BLADES = 13; //Number of sword beams the portals shoot.const int CMB_TEAR = 32768; //The combo to use for the tear in the fabric of reality. This is 4x4 tiles mind you.Set your Universal Attributes1: Death animation?2: Delay Before Opening Portal in frames?3: Teleport Delay in frames4: Solid Blocks Okay?Have a cosmic party of old spice body shots.
